mapper.select: SELECT bk.bible_kind as bibleKind,bk.language, bk.book_name as bookName, bk.bible_max_chapter as bookMaxChapter , bbkv.chapter_max_paragraph as ChapterMaxParagraph ,bbkv.paragraph_value as paragraphValue, bbkv.chapter, bbkv.paragraph FROM bible_book_kind_value_seconds as bbkv JOIN book_kind as bk ON bk.book_kind_idx = bbkv.book_kind_idx WHERE (bk.book_name = #{bookName} or bk.book_name_short = #{bookName}) and bbkv.chapter = #{chapter} and bbkv.chapter = #{chapter} AND bbkv.paragraph BETWEEN #{firstParagraph} and #{lastParagraph}
